Detailed Description

ScriptEditorDialog class is the dialog to edit and run scripts with Tonatiuh.

ScriptEditorDialog allow to the user open, edit, run and save scripts to automate the ray tracing.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ScriptEditorDialog::ScriptEditorDialog ( QVector< TPhotonMapFactory * >  listTPhotonMapFactory,
QVector< RandomDeviateFactory * >  listRandomDeviateFactory,
QString  dirName = 0,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a dialog to edit scripts and run them. The lists listTPhotonMapFactory and listRandomDeviateFactory are the photon map types and random generator types that can be defined in the scripts to run Tonatiuh. The dialog explorer shows the directories and scripts files from dirName path.

ScriptEditorDialog::~ScriptEditorDialog (  ) 

Destroys the file dialog.

Returns explorer current directory path.

void ScriptEditorDialog::NewScriptFile (  )  [private, slot]

Creates a new empty script.

Before creates the new scripts, it verifies if the current script can be closed.

bool ScriptEditorDialog::OkToContinue (  )  [private]

Returns true if the application is ready to start with other script. Otherwise, returns false.

void ScriptEditorDialog::OpenDirectory (  )  [private, slot]

A dialog is created to select a existing directory. File explorer shows selected directory contents.

void ScriptEditorDialog::OpenScriptFile (  )  [private, slot]

Opens a script file into the script editor and sets this file as current file.

A dialog is created to select an existing script file.

Before open the selected script, it verifies if the current script can be closed.

void ScriptEditorDialog::OpenScriptFile ( QListWidgetItem *  item  )  [private, slot]

Opens the file selected into the file explorer.

Before open the selected script, it verifies if the current script can be closed.

Refresh the file explorer contents.

Executes the code editor script.

void ScriptEditorDialog::Run (  )  [private, slot]

Executes the code editor script.

void ScriptEditorDialog::RunScript (  )  [private]

Executes the code editor script.

bool ScriptEditorDialog::SaveAsScriptFile (  )  [private, slot]

Returns true if script is correctly saved. Otherwise, returns false. A file dialog is created to select a file.

See also:
SaveScriptFile, SaveFile.

bool ScriptEditorDialog::SaveScript (  )  [private, slot]

Saves the editor code in the file defined as current. If a current file is not defined, it calls to SaveAsScriptFile to define a current file.

See also:
SaveScriptFile, SaveAsScriptFile.

bool ScriptEditorDialog::SaveScriptFile ( const QString &  fileName  )  [private]

Returns true if the scripts is correctly saved into the the given fileName. Otherwise, returns false.

See also:
SaveAsScriptFile, SaveScript.

void ScriptEditorDialog::SetCurrentFile ( const QString &  fileName  )  [private]

Sets the editor current script file to fileName.

Changes the editor dialog title to shows the current file base name.

void ScriptEditorDialog::StartDocument ( QString  fileName  )  [private]

Sets the code editor's contents to fileName contents and sets the currents file to fileName.
